Package covidSimulation

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • covidSimulation.Agent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeceasedAgent, InfectedAgent, RecoveredAgent, SusceptibleAgent
    public abstract class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
    Super-class of all agents. Each agent is defined by his current status, his goal (school, shopping, random...), his next status, his next position, his age, if he has increased risk for medical conditions, if he wears a mask. Some static variables are also defined : - the probability of being infected when an infected agent is in the neighborhood - the probability of recovering when infected - the strategies to apply for this simulation - the total number of deceased agents
    Author:
    Natacha

             int age,
             boolean atRisk,
             boolean hasMask)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        goal - the goal of the agent
        age - the age of the agent
        atRisk - a boolean equal to true if this agent has an increased risk due to medical conditions
        hasMask - a boolean equal to true if the agent wears a mask

        Parameters:

      • setProbRec

        public static void setProbRec​(float probRec)
        Sets the average probability of recovering.
        Parameters:
        probRec - the probability of recovering

      • computeNextStatus

        public abstract void computeNextStatus()
        Computes the next status according to the neighborhood and the current status of the agent. This method must be called for each agent before modifying really the status and the position. The priority is thus higher than computeNextPositionAndApply.

      • computeNextPositionAndApply

        public abstract void computeNextPositionAndApply()
        Computes the next position depending on the goal. If the goal is random, then choose a free position in the neighborhood randomly. Otherwise, choose a free position to move towards the goal. The next status must have been previously computed. The priority is thus lower than computeNextStatus.

      • getColor

        public abstract java.awt.Color getColor()
        Returns the display color of the agent
        Returns:
        the color to use to display this agent

      • computeNextPosition

        void computeNextPosition()
        Computes next position (distance of moving is 1 and only on a free cell). Stores it it nextPosition.

      • getNbNeighbours

        int getNbNeighbours​(repast.simphony.space.grid.GridPoint p)

      • mustNotMove

        boolean mustNotMove()
        When there is a curfew, agents must not move between 10PM and 8AM.
        Returns:
        true if the time tick corresponds to the period of curfew

      • moveRandomly

        java.util.ArrayList<repast.simphony.space.grid.GridPoint> moveRandomly()
        Returns the possible point to move on (max 8) by respecting the grid dimensions and the cell must be free.
        Returns:
        an array of GridPoint objects corresponding to the possible points to move on.

        Returns:
